nodes.name: Update reminder stage & last message date
Update status for emails that already voted

parameters.subject: =Hello {{ $json.Name }}, time to vote on the startups!
parameters.message:
=Hello {{ $json.Name }},

I hope you enjoyed the investment committee yesterday! Now on to the voting on the startups!

Please find the voting form here: Voting form

*The deadline to vote is {{ $('Aggregate variables values').item.json.data[4].VALUE }}*

Here you can find the recording: Recording here

Here is the startup material: Startup material here

If you want to ask more questions to the startups first, you can write them in these documents:

Questions to {{ $('Aggregate variables values').item.json.data[7].VALUE }}

Questions to {{ $('Aggregate variables values').item.json.data[9].VALUE }}

Questions to {{ $('Aggregate variables values').item.json.data[11].VALUE }}

The deadline for asking questions is {{ $('Aggregate variables values').item.json.data[13].VALUE }}. The startups will receive the link to these documents and answer directly underneath.

As some of us were not able to join the dinner for the discussion, we will host a discussion meeting on {{ $('Aggregate variables values').item.json.data[14].VALUE }} to be able to make an informed decision. You should have received a calendar invite.

Notes:

You should only vote one time per participant. Don't worry, you will be able to edit your answers during the voting period. Fill in your email address and you will receive a summary with your responses and a link to edit them.

Please don't forget to vote in the form here before {{ $('Aggregate variables values').item.json.data[4].VALUE }}

Best wishes
Sarah

parameters.subject: =Reminder to vote on the startups
parameters.message:
=Hello {{ $json.Name }}

How are you?

I wanted to remind you again to vote on the startups from the last investment committee!

Here is the voting form: Voting form

Have a great weekend

Best wishes
Sarah

parameters.subject: =Tomorrow is the last day!
parameters.message:
=Hello {{ $json.Name }}!

Please donâ€™t forget that tomorrow is the last day to vote on the startups from the last IC.

Here is the voting form in case you missed it: Voting form here

Have a great day!

Best wishes
Sarah

parameters.subject: =It's today {{ $json.Name }}!
parameters.message:
=The startup founders are eager to know your vote and today is the last chance to make your opinion count.

Please don't forget to complete the voting form here.

See you!

Best wishes
Sarah
